description:
This safe, water-resistant formula has a natural scent and is easy to apply. Make sure you bring enough for everyone.

  • Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Very stable under sunlight
  • Free of hormone disrupting chemicals. No oxybenzone
  • No titanium dioxide. Contains zinc that has been micronized for easy application and absorption
  • Contains antioxidant vitamins C and E to ward off free radicals caused by sunlight
  • Special 5-layer tube to decrease the possibility of leakage and puncture
  • Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible water resistance rating
name: Thinkbaby Safe Baby SPF 50+ Sunscreen Livestrong Travel Size 88ml
